name: The Center for Art, Compassion & Technology
tagline: planning portal for the center for Art, Compassion, and Technology (ACT),  a laterally minded hub for applied research and thought that advocates for the inclusion People of Color in the design, production, testing and deployment of emergent technologies.
body:
### Welcome to the planning page for The Center for Art Compassion & Technology
A.C.T is a laterally minded hub for applied research and thought that advocates for the inclusion People of Color in the design, production, testing, and deployment of emergent technologies in service of social justice and more equitable future histories.
